Detailed Description

McASP frame object params.

Mcasp_IOBuf structures are managed by the driver. MCASP buffers are the basis for all I/O operations. 'cmd' field contains the command id for the driver. 'status' is filled in by the driver and contains the status of the commmand.

Field Documentation

buffer address

uintptr_t Mcasp_IOBuf_t::arg
